entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Vauxhall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vauxhall AAFC 06:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023
Temperature: -13.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -15.4°C
Wind: E 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Snow at times heavy beginning early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:59 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:59 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:59 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023
